error.char_name_invalid: Each word must start with a capital letter and contain only letters (e.g. Dark Knight)
error.title: Error

WARRIOR.name: Warrior
WARRIOR.longDesc: A master of close-quarters combat with high survivability.

MAGE.name: Mage
MAGE.longDesc: Wields destructive arcane power from a distance.

RANGER.name: Ranger
RANGER.longDesc: Swift and precise, striking foes before they can react.

ROGUE.name: Rogue
ROGUE.longDesc: A shadowy assassin specializing in speed and critical strikes.

CLERIC.name: Cleric
CLERIC.longDesc: A holy defender who blends combat with divine protection.

PALADIN.name: Paladin
PALADIN.longDesc: An armored holy warrior who combines devastating melee with divine healing and protection.

game.too_far_merchant: You are too far from a merchant
game.not_available: That item is not available here
game.only_buy_one: You can only buy one of that item at a time
game.quest_near_npc: You must be near the quest NPC to complete this quest
game.trade_failed_accept: Failed to accept trade. Participant might be busy.
game.trade_failed_validation: Trade validation failed (inventory full or items missing)
game.connection_failed_desc: Failed to connect to server. Is it running?

social.already_in_group: Player is already in a group
social.leader_only_invite: Only the group leader can invite
social.no_invite: No active invitation for this group
social.leader_only_kick: Only the leader can kick players
social.kicked_from_group: You were kicked from the group

group.not_in_group: Not in a group. Invite someone to start one.

war_cry.name: War Cry
war_cry.desc: Bellow a battle cry, boosting your STR for 8s.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.desc: Slam your shield into a foe, stunning them for 2s.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: Spin your weapon, damaging all adjacent enemies.

battle_shout.name: Battle Shout
battle_shout.desc: Shout that reduces armor of all nearby enemies for 6s.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.desc: Hurl a blazing bolt at a distant target.

ice_bolt.name: Ice Bolt
ice_bolt.desc: A shard of ice that pierces through magical defenses.

thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
thunderstorm.desc: Call down lightning at a location, hitting all nearby enemies.

mana_shield.name: Mana Shield
mana_shield.desc: Convert mana into a protective arcane shell (+armor for 6s).

frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
frost_nova.desc: Explosion of frost that damages all enemies around you.

arcane_surge.name: Arcane Surge
arcane_surge.desc: Channel immense arcane power into a devastating bolt.

multi_shot.name: Multi Shot
multi_shot.desc: Loose a volley of arrows hitting enemies in a small area.

poison_arrow.name: Poison Arrow
poison_arrow.desc: Arrow coated in toxin that poisons the target over 5s.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.desc: Drastically increase AGI and dodge chance for 5s.

aimed_shot.name: Aimed Shot
aimed_shot.desc: A carefully aimed shot from across the entire battlefield.

mark_target.name: Mark Target
mark_target.desc: Mark an enemy, reducing their armor for 8s.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.desc: A vicious stab dealing massive damage, doubled from stealth.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.desc: Vanish from sight, becoming invisible for 6s.

envenom.name: Envenom
envenom.desc: Coat your blade in venom, poisoning the target over 6s.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.desc: Throw a smoke bomb that stuns nearby enemies for 1.5s.

hemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
hemorrhage.desc: Drain life from a foe, healing yourself for half the damage.

holy_strike.name: Holy Strike
holy_strike.desc: A blessed melee blow that smites your enemy with holy light.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Channel divine energy to restore your own health.

divine_shield.name: Divine Shield
divine_shield.desc: Surround yourself in holy light, becoming invulnerable for 4s.

holy_nova.name: Holy Nova
holy_nova.desc: Burst of holy light that heals all nearby allies.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: Afflict an enemy with a dark curse, lowering their INT for 10s.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Launch a holy bolt at an enemy target.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.desc: A consecrated melee blow that sears enemies with divine force.

lay_on_hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay_on_hands.desc: Channel the Light to restore a large amount of your health.

consecration.name: Consecration
consecration.desc: Radiate holy fire, scorching all enemies in the area around you.

aura_of_protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura_of_protection.desc: Envelop yourself in divine plate, massively boosting armor for 8s.

holy_bolt.name: Holy Bolt
holy_bolt.desc: Launch a concentrated bolt of divine light at a distant enemy.

merchant.title: MERCHANT ESTABLISHMENT
merchant.no_items_sell: Your coffers contain no tradable wares

bank.title: Royal Vault
bank.subtitle: Secure Asset Repository
bank.empty_selection: Select an item to manage your assets

dialogue.reward_prompt: Great job on {{title}}! Here is your reward.

scoreboard.title: Scoreboard
scoreboard.level_private: Level is private ‚Äî only you can see yours

tips: Abraxas was once a floating citadel of the High Magi.
Ancient runes suggest the Arena was built on a ley line junction.
Never turn your back on a Rogue in the dark corners of the Arena.
Warriors favor strength, but a focused mind can pierce any plate.
Goblins are cowards, but their numbers can overwhelm the unwary.
The Lich of the Depths has not been seen for centuries... until now.
Potions are brewed from the essence of fallen elementals.

trade.title: Trade
trade.add_items_hint: Add Items (click to add ¬∑ click offer to remove)
